channel.title: HELP! trade decline=disconnect!HELP!
channel.description:
On my server when I trade somebody or when they trade me. whoever declines. it disconnects us and reconnects it. If you know how to fix this please tell me!! it's to easy to dupe.
Thanks

item.title: HELP! trade decline=disconnect!HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

That’s something you’re going to have to figure out for yourself. I’m guessing you’re using Delta? That’s the only source I’ve ever looked into.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! trade decline=disconnect!HELP!
item.dc:creator: @masterscapeserver masterscapeserver
item.description:
@masterscapeserver wrote:

ok but it’s anoying to DC every time you decline. do u know how to remove it?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! trade decline=disconnect!HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

That was put in so you can tell who is duping. The dupe will still work even if you took it out. The key is to look at how players log out. If you’re still in the trade whilst trying to log out, decline the trade.

Anyways, this is the wrong section.

Read full topic
